reportparamfield_meta.sql:
SELECT branchid FROM branchmast WHERE compcode 
= :company

SELECT mastercore FROM control WHERE UPPER(companyid) = 
UPPER(:companyid)

SELECT masttreecore FROM control WHERE 
UPPER(companyid) = UPPER(:companyid)

query_meta.sq:
SELECT pltype,SUM(amount) amount FROM (
SELECT 'Total Income' pltype,SUM(credit)-SUM(debit) amount FROM `$mastercore` a,dailytrans d,branchmast bm
WHERE a.masterid = d.mid
AND d.branchid = bm.branchmastid
AND upper(bm.branchid) = upper(:companyid)
AND a.malie = 'i'
UNION
SELECT 'Total Stock' pltype,SUM(debit)-SUM(credit) amount
FROM `$mastercore` a,dailytrans d,`$masttreelinkcore` b,`$mastercore` c,branchmast bm
WHERE a.masterid = d.mid
AND upper(bm.branchid) = upper(:companyid)
AND a.masterid = b.childid
AND d.branchid = bm.branchmastid
AND b.parentid = c.masterid
AND c.mname = 'PURCHASES / CONSUMPTION'
UNION
SELECT 'Total Expenses' pltype,SUM(debit)-SUM(credit) amount FROM `$mastercore` a,dailytrans d,branchmast bm
WHERE a.masterid = d.mid
AND upper(bm.branchid) = upper(:companyid)
AND d.branchid = bm.branchmastid
AND a.malie = 'e'
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM `$masttreelinkcore` b,`$mastercore` c WHERE a.masterid = b.childid AND b.parentid = c.masterid AND c.mname = 'PURCHASES / CONSUMPTION')
UNION
SELECT 'Total Income',0 FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'Total Stock',0 FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT 'Total Expenses',0 FROM DUAL) a
WHERE :mastercore = :mastercore
AND :masttreelinkcore = :masttreelinkcore
GROUP BY pltype
